ai-patthana8.21:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana8.21:1.1_0: Such a thing doesn’t give rise to diversity of principles.
ai-patthana8.21:1.1_1: for wisdom, they don’t see the cause of condition for knowledge.
ai-patthana8.21:1.1_2: Mastered for a person with wisdom ...
ai-patthana8.21:2.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause, the reason for something,
ai-patthana8.21:3.1_0: Nor do they have no directly known principle.
ai-patthana8.21:4.1_0: (These five discourses should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
